head.title: Another N.J. Encyclopedia Is Heard From

hedline.hl1: Another N.J. Encyclopedia Is Heard From

block.p: As a reference librarian in at the Maurice M. Pine Free Public Library of Fair Lawn, I look forward to ''The Encyclopedia of New Jersey,'' described in your Jan. 16 article, but I wonder if Drs. Mappen and Lurie are aware of an already existing ''Encyclopedia of New Jersey,'' first published in 1983. The latest edition, 1997-98, lists for $95 and contains 532 pages. The new one, thanks to various subsidies, is expected to cost $70 to $85.
